import React from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faReact, faAws, faWindows, faJava, faGithub } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import HomepageImage from '../../../Images/homepage.png' import SpringBootLogo from '../../../Images/springboot.png' import './Carousel.css' function Carousel(props) { //Settings for carousel let settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 800, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 }; //Variables to control class theming let sliderContainerClass = 'slider-container slider-' + props.theme; let faLinkClass = 'fa-' + props.theme; return (
